column4: Does anyone know if the new version of Ubuntu supports the Atheros AR5007EG out of the box?
the atheros adaptor in my aspire one worked right away on 9.04
Thanks, that is the computer I am actully thinking of using it with. Any other driver issues with the One?
not really, hit up https://help.ubuntu.com/community/AspireOne and https://help.ubuntu.com/community/AA1/Using after the install
